message.content:
List all the webp files in public/assets/img/products/ that were recently created (the 32 new ones from the batch conversion). I need to identify which ones need to be re-converted at quality 80 instead of 100.

The files that were converted are:
cex-010.webp, cex-010-alt.webp, cex-011.webp, cex-001-caja.webp, cex-001-caja2.webp, cex-001-alt2.webp, cex-002-caja.webp, cex-002-caja2.webp, cex-002-alt4.webp, cex-002-alt5.webp, cex-003-caja.webp, cex-003-alt2.webp, cex-004-caja.webp, cex-004-alt.webp, cex-005-caja.webp, cex-005-alt.webp, cex-006-caja.webp, cex-006-alt.webp, cex-007-caja.webp, cex-007-alt.webp, cex-008-alt.webp, cam-001-alt2.webp, cam-001-alt3.webp, par-003-alt.webp, electrode-he-100-alt.webp, electrode-he-200-alt.webp, electrode-he-400-alt.webp, electrode-he-700-alt.webp, ele-005-pack2.webp, ele-006-pack2.webp, mas-005.webp, mas-006.webp

Run: ls -la public/assets/img/products/ | grep -E "(cex-010|cex-010-alt|cex-011|cex-001-caja|cex-001-alt2|cex-002-caja|cex-002-alt[45]|cex-003-caja|cex-003-alt2|cex-004-caja|cex-004-alt|cex-005-caja|cex-005-alt|cex-006-caja|cex-006-alt|cex-007-caja|cex-007-alt|cex-008-alt|cam-001-alt[23]|par-003-alt|electrode-he-100-alt|electrode-he-200-alt|electrode-he-400-alt|electrode-he-700-alt|ele-005-pack2|ele-006-pack2|mas-005|mas-006)\.webp"

to show their current sizes.

input.description: List the 32 recently converted webp files with sizes

content.text: Here are the 32 recently converted webp files with their current sizes. I found 30 out of 32 -- two files appear to be missing: `cex-001-caja2.webp` and `cex-002-caja2.webp`. Let me verify those.

input.description: Check for cex-001-caja2 and cex-002-caja2 files

content.text:
Good, they are there. The initial grep pattern did not match them because `cex-001-caja` was matching the file without the `2` suffix, and the `2` variants were not explicitly included. Here is the complete list of all 32 files with their sizes:

**Files under 10 KB (likely fine even at quality 100):**

| File | Size |
|------|------|
| `cex-010.webp` | 3.9 KB |
| `cex-003-alt2.webp` | 4.0 KB |
| `cex-005-alt.webp` | 4.0 KB |
| `cex-001-alt2.webp` | 4.6 KB |
| `cex-006-alt.webp` | 4.4 KB |
| `cex-007-alt.webp` | 4.3 KB |
| `cex-004-alt.webp` | 5.2 KB |
| `cam-001-alt3.webp` | 5.7 KB |
| `cex-002-alt5.webp` | 6.4 KB |
| `cex-008-alt.webp` | 6.5 KB |
| `cam-001-alt2.webp` | 6.9 KB |
| `cex-002-alt4.webp` | 7.6 KB |
| `cex-011.webp` | 9.1 KB |
| `electrode-he-200-alt.webp` | 9.5 KB |

**Files 10-20 KB (could benefit from quality 80):**

| File | Size |
|------|------|
| `electrode-he-100-alt.webp` | 10.4 KB |
| `electrode-he-400-alt.webp` | 11.5 KB |
| `cex-005-caja.webp` | 14.5 KB |
| `par-003-alt.webp` | 14.8 KB |
| `ele-006-pack2.webp` | 15.7 KB |
| `cex-001-caja.webp` | 16.5 KB |
| `electrode-he-700-alt.webp` | 17.1 KB |
| `ele-005-pack2.webp` | 18.1 KB |
| `cex-006-caja.webp` | 17.8 KB |
| `cex-004-caja.webp` | 18.0 KB |
| `cex-007-caja.webp` | 18.1 KB |
| `cex-003-caja.webp` | 18.4 KB |
| `cex-002-caja2.webp` | 19.5 KB |

**Files over 20 KB (strongest candidates for re-conversion at quality 80):**

| File | Size |
|------|------|
| `cex-010-alt.webp` | 21.7 KB |
| `cex-001-caja2.webp` | 23.5 KB |
| `cex-002-caja.webp` | 25.4 KB |
| `mas-005.webp` | 30.6 KB |
| `mas-006.webp` | **102.9 KB** |

**Summary:**

- **Total files found:** 32 (all accounted for)
- **All created:** Feb 15, 2026 at 20:32 (same timestamp, confirming batch conversion)
- **Under 200 KB threshold from CLAUDE.md:** All pass, though `mas-006.webp` at 102.9 KB is by far the largest
- **Strongest re-conversion candidates:** The 5 files over 20 KB would see the most meaningful savings from quality 80, especially `mas-006.webp` which at ~103 KB could likely drop to ~60-70 KB. The 13 files in the 10-20 KB range would see moderate savings. The 14 files under 10 KB are already small and re-converting them would yield negligible gains.
